About the Company: Jet Airways (India) Limited is a holding company. The Company is a scheduled airline with domestic and international operations. The Company operates into two business segments: Air Transportation and Leasing of Aircraft. The geographic segment consists of domestic (air transportation within India) and international (air transportation outside India). As of March 31, 2012, its Gulf network operated 44 daily flights between India and the Middle East. As of March 31, 2012, its airlines flew to 22 international destinations. The Company has a Frequent Flyer Programme named Jet Privilege. On March 25, 2012, the erstwhile JetLite and Jet Airways Konnect services had started operating under the JetKonnect brand. Jet Lite (India) Limited is its subsidiary..The company also in the business segment of Air Transportation, Leasing of Aircraft.
